document_data.name: Phlydia
document_data.mainbody:
'''Phlydia''' was a resident of [[Candlekeep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was somewhat absent-minded and couldn't stand being cooped up in the library for too long.

{{quote|You know how I can't stand the constant shuffling of [[arthritis|arthritic]] feet up in the library...|Phlydia}}
document_data.Relationships: Phlydia was friends with the [[sage]] [[Gorion]] and was quite fond of his [[Gorion's Ward|adopted child]].
document_data.Possessions: Phlydia wore a simple [[gold]] [[necklace]] and was adorned in a ''[[mage robe of fire resistance]]''. She was armed with a mundane [[dagger]].
document_data.History: In [[1368 DR]], Phlydia inattentively misplaced her copy of ''[[the History of Halruaa]]'' and was offering her gratitude and a [[lynx eye]] as the reward for the tome's return.
